appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
1. Introduction of Mobile PIN and fingerprint based login.
a) Please set your MPIN the first time you use this new version.
b) First time in the Day login with username + password + PAN/DOB. Then every subsequent login is with Mobile PIN or fingerprint

creator: Almondz Global Securities Ltd
descriptionHtml:
Almondz Online is an online trading platform brought to you by Almondz Global Securities Ltd.
Almondz Group is one of India’s leading Financial Services providers with interest across Merchant Banking, Infrastructure Advisory, Debt Portfolio Management, Retail & Distribution, Insurance, Equity and Commodity Broking.
Main Features of Almondz Online app :-
-MPIN facility to avoid frequent logout.
- Multi Exchange Streaming Market Watch
- Trade facility in NSE, BSE
- Live Reports
- Crisp Charts Intraday and Historic
- Streaming and Lite Mode to suit
- Customized and Multiple Market Watch
- Online Fund Transfer
- Get Order Book, Trade Book & much more to keep a track of your Orders, Positions & Margins

appDetails.recentChangesHtml: General Bug Fixes and performance improvement
